Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit.DAY
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnitType instead.
    org.afree.data.time.RegularTimePeriod.DEFAULT_TIME_ZONE
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.11, we discourage the use of this field - use TimeZone.getDefault() instead.
    org.afree.chart.axis.SegmentedTimeline.FIRST_MONDAY_AFTER_1900
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7. This field doesn't take into account changes to the default time zone.
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit.HOUR
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnitType instead.
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit.MILLISECOND
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnitType instead.
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit.MINUTE
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnitType instead.
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit.MONTH
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnitType instead.
    org.afree.chart.axis.SegmentedTimeline.NO_DST_TIME_ZONE
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7. This field is initialised based on the default time zone, and doesn't take into account subsequent changes to the default.
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit.SECOND
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnitType instead.
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit.YEAR
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnitType instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit.getCount()
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnit.getMultiple().
    org.afree.chart.plot.CrosshairState.getDomainAxisIndex()
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.11, the domain axis should be determined using the dataset index.
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.getExplodePercent(int)
    Use PiePlot.getExplodePercent(Comparable) instead.
    org.afree.ui.TextAnchor.getHorizontalOpposite(TextAnchor)
    Renderers now have positive and negative item label text anchors.
    org.afree.data.jdbc.JDBCXYDataset.getLegendItemCount()
    This method is not used in JFreeChart 1.0.x (it was left in the API by mistake and is officially deprecated from version 1.0.3 onwards).
    org.afree.data.jdbc.JDBCXYDataset.getLegendItemLabels()
    This method is not used in JFreeChart 1.0.x (it was left in the API by mistake and is officially deprecated from version 1.0.3 onwards).
    org.afree.chart.plot.CrosshairState.getRangeAxisIndex()
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.11, the domain axis should be determined using the dataset index.
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.getSectionOutlineEffect()
    Use PiePlot.getSectionOutlineEffect(Comparable) and PiePlot.getBaseSectionOutlineEffect()
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.getSectionOutlinePaintType()
    Use PiePlot.getSectionOutlinePaintType(Comparable) and PiePlot.getBaseSectionOutlinePaintType(). Deprecated as of JFreeChart version 1.0.6.
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.getSectionOutlineStroke()
    Use PiePlot.getSectionOutlineStroke(Comparable) and PiePlot.getBaseSectionOutlineStroke(). Deprecated as of JFreeChart version 1.0.6.
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.getSectionPaintType()
    Use PiePlot.getSectionPaint(Comparable) and PiePlot.getBaseSectionPaintType(). Deprecated as of JFreeChart version 1.0.6.
    org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer.getShapesFilled()
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit.getUnit()
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.13, use the getUnitType() method.
    org.afree.ui.TextAnchor.getVerticalOpposite(TextAnchor)
    Renderers now have positive and negative item label text anchors.
    org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer.setLinesVisible(boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
    org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.XYLineAndShapeRenderer.setLinesVisible(boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7, use the per-series and base level settings.
    org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer.setLinesVisible(Boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.setSectionOutlineEffect(PathEffect)
    Use PiePlot.setSectionOutlineEffect(Comparable, PathEffect) instead.
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.setSectionOutlinePaintType(PaintType)
    Use PiePlot.setSectionOutlinePaintType(Comparable, PaintType) and PiePlot.setBaseSectionOutlinePaintType(PaintType). Deprecated as of version JFreeChart 1.0.6.
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.setSectionOutlineStroke(Float)
    Use PiePlot.setSectionOutlineStroke(Comparable, Float) and #setBaseSectionOutlineStroke(Stroke). Deprecated as of version JFreeChart 1.0.6.
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.setSectionOutlineStroke(int, Float)
    Use PiePlot.setSectionOutlineStroke(Comparable, Float) instead.
    org.afree.chart.plot.PiePlot.setSectionPaintType(PaintType)
    Use #setSectionPaintType(Comparable, Paint) and PiePlot.setBaseSectionPaintType(PaintType). Deprecated as of JFreeChart version 1.0.6.
    org.afree.chart.entity.LegendItemEntity.setSeriesIndex(int)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.6, use the LegendItemEntity.setSeriesKey(Comparable) method.
    org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer.setShapesFilled(boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
    org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer.setShapesFilled(Boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
    org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.XYLineAndShapeRenderer.setShapesFilled(Boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7, use the per-series and base level settings.
    org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.StandardXYItemRenderer.setShapesFilled(Boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.8, you should avoid using this method and rely on just the per-series (StandardXYItemRenderer.setSeriesShapesFilled(int, Boolean)) and base-level (StandardXYItemRenderer.setBaseShapesVisible( boolean)) settings.
    org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer.setShapesVisible(boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
    org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.XYLineAndShapeRenderer.setShapesVisible(boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7, use the per-series and base level settings.
    org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer.setShapesVisible(Boolean)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
    org.afree.data.xy.XYSeries.update(int, Number)
    Renamed XYSeries.updateByIndex(int, Number) to avoid confusion with the XYSeries.update(Number, Number) method.
    org.afree.chart.plot.CrosshairState.updateCrosshairPoint(double, double, double, double, PlotOrientation)
    Use CrosshairState.updateCrosshairPoint(double, double, int, int, double, double, PlotOrientation) . See bug report 1086307.
    org.afree.chart.plot.CrosshairState.updateCrosshairX(double)
    Use CrosshairState.updateCrosshairX(double, int). See bug report 1086307.
    org.afree.chart.plot.CrosshairState.updateCrosshairY(double)
    Use CrosshairState.updateCrosshairY(double, int). See bug report 1086307.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateAxis(String, TimeZone)
    From JFreeChart 1.0.11 onwards, use DateAxis.DateAxis(String, TimeZone, Locale) instead, to explicitly set the locale.
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit(int, int, DateFormat)
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnit.DateTickUnit( DateTickUnitType, int, DateFormat).
    org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit(int, int, int, int, DateFormat)
    As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnit.DateTickUnit( DateTickUnitType, int, DateTickUnitType, int, DateFormat).
    org.afree.data.time.Month(Date, TimeZone)
    Since JFreeChart 1.0.12, use Month.Month(Date, TimeZone, Locale) instead.
    org.afree.data.time.Quarter(Date, TimeZone)
    Since JFreeChart 1.0.12, use Quarter.Quarter(Date, TimeZone, Locale) instead.
    org.afree.data.time.TimeSeries(Comparable, Class)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.13, it is not necessary to specify the timePeriodClass as this will be inferred when the first data item is added to the dataset.
    org.afree.data.time.TimeSeries(Comparable, String, String, Class)
    As of JFreeChart 1.0.13, it is not necessary to specify the timePeriodClass as this will be inferred when the first data item is added to the dataset.
    org.afree.data.time.Year(Date, TimeZone)
    Since JFreeChart 1.0.12, use Year.Year(Date, TimeZone, Locale) instead.
